subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king created the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के स्थानीय निर्माण किया गया कौन सर था?
explanation_en:
King Ram Singh I is credited with the creation of Jaipur. He was the founder of the city and its ruler in 1727.
English: King Ram Singh I is the ruler who established Jaipur in 1727. He founded the city and its kingdom.
